# Groar

> Turn your social media metrics into shareable visuals

Groar is a web application that transforms social media analytics into beautiful, shareable images. Users can create visual representations of their growth metrics to share on social platforms.

## Features

- Create shareable visuals from social media metrics
- Support for followers, impressions, replies, and engagement rate
- Customizable backgrounds and text colors
- Export as high-quality PNG images
- Currently supports X (formerly Twitter)

## Target Users

- Content creators
- Social media managers
- Influencers
- Anyone wanting to showcase their social media growth

## Creator

Built by Yannick Ferire (@yannick_ferire on X)

## Links

- Website: https://gro.ar
- Creator: https://x.com/yannick_ferire
